rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Ohhh, how am I ever going to find
the manpower for this?

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, the thing is, we started providing
this new service recently.

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Basically, we find things people lost
on their travels. It's mainly targeted at
adventurers and merchants.

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0004
rows.name:
After all, we travel to all sorts of places
for our mercenary work, you know?

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0005
rows.name:
So if we search for people's lost things
while we're there, it lets us earn extra
rewards more efficiently.

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0006
rows.name:
Problem is, it's become such a popular
service, we're going to need a specialist
team to keep up with all the requests...

rows.label: tlk43420341_07_msg0007
rows.name:
That would help us a lot, thank you!
I hope it won't tire you out!
